trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> for printing a document together with its associated annotations.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref>列印文件，以及其相關聯的附註。

trans-unit.source: The AnnotationDocumentPaginator class wraps the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor to add the user annotations to the pages for printing.
trans-unit.target: AnnotationDocumentPaginator 類別包裝<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>指定至<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，將使用者註解新增至列印的頁面。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"></xref> class based on a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> and annotation storage <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"></xref>類別，根據指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref>和註解儲存體<xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: By default this constructor sets the text flow direction to <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個建構函式設定至<xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>。</xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>文字流動方向

trans-unit.source: If needed you can use one of the alternate <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor overloads to set the text <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> to a different setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要您可以使用其中一個替代<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式多載，來設定文字<xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>設不同的設定。</xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator> class wraps the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor to add the user annotations to the pages for printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>類別會包裝<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>指定至<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，將使用者註解新增至列印的頁面。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>

trans-unit.source: The document to add the printed annotations to.
trans-unit.target: 新增列印的附註的文件。

trans-unit.source: The annotation storage stream to retrieve the annotations from.
trans-unit.target: 擷取從註解註解儲存體資料流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"></xref> class based on a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"></xref>類別，根據指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: By default this constructor sets the text flow direction to <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個建構函式設定至<xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>。</xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>文字流動方向

trans-unit.source: If needed you can use one of the alternate <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor overloads to set the text <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> to a different setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要您可以使用其中一個替代<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式多載，來設定文字<xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>設不同的設定。</xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator> class wraps the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor to add the user annotations to the pages for printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>類別會包裝<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>指定至<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，將使用者註解新增至列印的頁面。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>

trans-unit.source: The document to add the printed annotations to.
trans-unit.target: 新增列印的附註的文件。

trans-unit.source: The store to retrieve the annotations from.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的註解從存放區。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"></xref> class based on a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref>, annotation storage <xref:System.IO.Stream>, and text <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"></xref>類別，根據指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref>，註解儲存體<xref:System.IO.Stream>，和文字<xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref>。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator> class wraps the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor to add the user annotations to the pages for printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>類別會包裝<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>指定至<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，將使用者註解新增至列印的頁面。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>

trans-unit.source: The document to add the printed annotations to.
trans-unit.target: 新增列印的附註的文件。

trans-unit.source: The annotation storage stream to retrieve the annotations from.
trans-unit.target: 擷取從註解註解儲存體資料流。

trans-unit.source: The text flow direction, <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 文字流動方向， <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"></xref> class based on a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref>, and text <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"></xref>類別，根據指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref>，和文字<xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator> class wraps the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor to add the user annotations to the pages for printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>類別會包裝<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>指定至<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，將使用者註解新增至列印的頁面。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>

trans-unit.source: The document to add the printed annotations to.
trans-unit.target: 新增列印的附註的文件。

trans-unit.source: The store to retrieve the annotations from.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的註解從存放區。

trans-unit.source: The text flow direction, <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 文字流動方向， <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Cancels all asynchronous operations initiated with a given userState object.
trans-unit.target: 使用起始的所有非同步作業會取消給定 userState 物件。

trans-unit.source: The unique application-defined identifier passed in the call to start the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟動非同步作業呼叫中，傳遞的應用程式定義的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Forces a pagination of the content, updates <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*> with the new total, and sets <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid*> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 會強制重新編頁的內容，更新<> *> 設定新的總計，與<> *> 來<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Immediately after ComputePageCount returns, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> will be `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount%2A> property will reflect the total number of pages.
trans-unit.target: ComputePageCount 傳回之後，立即<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>將`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount%2A>屬性會反映總頁數。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of pages may change if the annotation content is modified or the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> is changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果註解內容有修改，可能會變更的頁數或<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>變更。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Starts an asynchronous pagination of the content, updates <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*> with the new total, and sets <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid*> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when it is finished.
trans-unit.target: 啟動 更新內容的非同步分頁<> *> 設定新的總計，與<> *> 來<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>完成時。

trans-unit.source: The `userState` parameter is intended for use with <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A> method if the application wishes to cancel the asynchronous operation before completion.
trans-unit.target: `userState`參數適用於搭配<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A>方法，如果應用程式想要取消非同步作業完成前的。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application-defined object for identifying the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 識別非同步作業的應用程式定義的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> together with associated user-annotations for a specified page number.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref>連同相關聯使用者註釋為指定的頁面數目。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based page number of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> to return.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的頁碼<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref>傳回。

trans-unit.source: The for the specified pageNumber; or , if the specified pageNumber does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定 pageNumber ; 或 ，如果指定 pageNumber 不存在。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> together with associated user-annotations for a specified page number.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref>連同相關聯使用者註釋為指定的頁面數目。

trans-unit.source: The `userState` parameter is intended for use with <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A> method if the application wishes to cancel the asynchronous operation before completion.
trans-unit.target: `userState`參數適用於搭配<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A>方法，如果應用程式想要取消非同步作業完成前的。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based page number of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的頁碼<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref>擷取。

trans-unit.source: An application-defined object that is used to identify the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式定義物件，用來識別非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*> is the total number of pages.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*>是總頁數。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*>

trans-unit.source: IsPageCountValid may switch from `true` to `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount%2A> recomputed if a change to the content or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> triggers repagination.
trans-unit.target: 從可能切換 IsPageCountValid`true`至`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount%2A>重新計算內容的變更如果或<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>觸發重新編頁。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if pagination is complete and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*> represents the total number of pages; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if pagination is in process and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*> represents the number of pages currently formatted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果分頁已完成和<> *> 代表總計的頁面數; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果分頁是在處理序和<> *> 代表目前已格式化的頁數。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the number of pages currently formatted.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前已格式化的頁數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> may change from `true` to `false` and PageCount recomputed if a change to the content or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> triggers repagination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>可能會從不`true`至`false`和 PageCount 重新計算，如果變更的內容或<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>觸發重新編頁。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A></xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the total number of annotation pages; otherwise if <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the number of pages currently formatted (pagination in process).
trans-unit.target: 如果<> *> 是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，總頁數註解，否則如果<> *> 是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，頁數目前已格式化 （處理序中的分頁）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the suggested width and height of each page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的建議的寬度和高度的每一頁。

trans-unit.source: PageSize gets or sets the *suggested* size for formatting pages.
trans-unit.target: PageSize 取得或設定*建議*用於格式化頁面大小。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage.Size%2A> property to get the actual size of the page (if it is required the actual size may be cropped from the suggested PageSize).
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage.Size%2A>屬性來取得實際頁面大小 （如有必要的實際大小可能會從從建議的 PageSize）。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: The suggested width and height for formatting pages.
trans-unit.target: 建議的寬度和高度格式化網頁。

trans-unit.source: Gets the source document that is being paginated.
trans-unit.target: 取得要分頁的來源文件。

trans-unit.source: The source document that is being paginated.
trans-unit.target: 正在重新編頁來源文件。
